features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Complete authentication system with registration, login, logout, and JWT token verification

features.name: Property Management
features.description: Full property listing system with CRUD operations, photos, availability, and search

features.name: Booking System
features.description: Complete booking management with status tracking, notifications, and reviews

features.name: Real-time Messaging
features.description: WebSocket-based messaging system for guests and hosts with conversation management

features.name: Review System
features.description: Multi-criteria rating system for properties with photo support

features.name: Notification System
features.description: Real-time notifications for bookings, messages, and reviews

features.name: Admin Actions
features.description: Admin panel for user verification and property approval

frontend_structure.current_state: Basic placeholder content with Expo tutorial information

backend_features.database: PostgreSQL with comprehensive schema validation using Zod
backend_features.file_upload: Multer for image uploads with 5MB limit
backend_features.validation: Zod schemas for all input validation
backend_features.error_handling: Comprehensive error responses with error codes
backend_features.cors: Configured for multiple origins including localhost and production
